Hello Developers,

 

I would like the Calendar Control to show more than one month at the same time only. I mean I want to show multiple months with all its days like the WinForms Calendar Control…

 

I know there is no property provided for this but:

Is there a way doing this only by using Styles and Templates? I don’t want any Code-behind... it should be done only in XAML.

 

I think of a template that contains several calendar-controls which must be synchronized when one Calendar Control switches to another month?

 

Would be thankful for any hint…

 

Ponzilla
